description:
For many organizations rapid machine learning deployment is often an
oxymoron. BCG Source provides a one-stop shop for data lineage and model
development. We will demonstrate how easy deployment enables quick
diagnoses that a model is biased. Since it is essential to deploy
unbiased machine learning, we will show how to remove this bias. You
will learn about common machine-learning and data-science pitfalls, how
to easily deploy a machine learning model, how to spot bias and how to
remove bias.

**Feedback form:** https://python.it/feedback-1808

in \_\_on **Sunday 5 May** at 11:00 `**See
schedule** </en/sprints/schedule/pycon10/>`__
title: Source; deploying unbiased models effortlessly.
